categories: Category:Plants of the Outer Rim Territories

nodes.text: Yellow pod weeds were a type of plant found on the planet of Lok. During the Galactic Civil War, Nym, the leader of the Lok Revenants, ordered Ran Machado to have these weeds and removed from Nym's Stronghold.

Yellow pod weeds appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
